original_title: Return to Méliès: Borowczyk and Early Cinema
overview: This six-minute short from director Daniel Bird takes a look at the silent cinema pioneers that influenced the work of Walterian Borowczyk. We take a look at various aspects to THE STRANGE CASE OF DR. JEKYLL AND MISS OSBOURNE and then see the influence that some early silent filmmakers had on it. This includes the work of Georges Melies as well as others.
title: Return to Méliès: Borowczyk and Early Cinema
